name: Numbers 2048
description:
Numbers 2048 is not only easy but also interesting and puzzle game

How to play?
-If there have more than two adjacent squares with the same number, click on one of the square and the adjacent blocks will be automatically combined and become a higher-level square.
-When there have no adjacent square with the same number, game would be over

Why not play this funny and relaxing game?
Let’s enjoy it!
